title: Atlas of Conquests
description: ​Travel registering App that allows users to keep a record of the countries they already visited and those they wish to visit, with useful and constantly updated information for each country.​

title: Quidditch Maze
description: Harry Potter-themed game, where players navigate through a maze to reach their ultimate goal. The game offers three levels, power-ups, and a math test at the end.

title: Competitive Pokédex
description: A Pokédex app for competitive Pokémon players. Users can search by name or number to retrieve Pokémon stats directly from the PokeAPI.
